Review.Contenu: Subscription sneaked up on me from 12.99 to 95.99 very quietly with literally little improvement in fact the connection quality is worse.  I am outraged by their unethical business practices.  Avoid at all cost.  Customer service only replies with passive aggressive not very usefull answers.  I am still trying to get confirmation my subscription has indeed been cancelled.
Even though I cancelled subscription you’re still taking money from me each month and it’s not possible to cancel it anyhow!!!

Review.Titre: Bad Customer Service and automatic bots
Review.Contenu: If the vpn service and the locations works then it is fine, if you ever have to contact customer service after you take the premium to get help on some locations, you will not get a response from them. I have send emails and also through automatic chat bots , it will take your email and name to contact back by an agent which never happens. it is been two week and more and i havent got a single response from the customer service or any agent for that matter.
I cancelled my orderYour service messed up my  internet service- I want my money back

After signing up initially, the company proceed to take funds out of your account, with no warning or notification to ask if you want to carry on with the service . After emails or communication stops and I am sure they hope you go away , not acceptable

Review.Titre: It took to long for support to listen what I was saying
Review.Contenu: It took to long for support to understand that issue was not my devices but the actual virtual location in Colombia. Even though I explained clearly in first emails that I have tried in several devices even outside of home and still gave me the wrong around answer to check tour device version . Re installed all that pre-populated typical  answers from an IT support department.

Review.Titre: After one year of using hotspot shield…
Review.Contenu: After one year of using hotspot shield I was happy, until last two weeks where I paid by accident 2 times for subscription. I sent a refund request so the take away my premium account but I never get the money back. In the meantime I paid for another premium and I get it for exactly 1 week. Today they turn it off. So they stole from me over 30 pounds and I get one week of a premium service.

Review.Titre: Hotspot shield: ok product but tech support, billing and account documentation is terrible.   Do not use!
Review.Contenu: I had been using hotspot shield for some time.   Right around the end of the year, I realized that I was at the basic service and not at the premium service I had paid for.   I tried to log in to my account to see what happened and I couldn’t get in.   I called support and they said that they would not deal with me until I could prove that I had paid for the service.  I tried to find the documentation but no luck.  A few days ago I received a notice from Apple that I was going to be charged for another year from them.  The reason I had no credit card documentation was that it was done through the Apple Store.  I found the documentation and sent it to them canceling the extension and asking for a refund for the previous 4 months where they did not provide the service.   They responded with instructions on how to reinstate the software without able to log in.   The product is ok but the technical support, billing and attitude are terrible.
The payment was taken automatically when I have tried to cancel
I request for unsubscribe, however you’re deducting every month the subscription fee, therefore, I kindly request you to deactivate my subscription.

Review.Titre: I can't change the location it shows

Review.Contenu: Is not work I need my refund

Review.Titre: I bought a lifetime license - they broke their promise
Review.Contenu: I bought a lifetime license, initially it worked fine.The company changed the lifetime license capabilities. They limited data/speed/countries on the lifetime license. If the company breaks their promise to their early customers, they cannot be trust. How can I trust them with my security. They do not even allow me to contact them.==> Also, I have no problem logging in. It is the deprecated functionality that has rendered the lifetime license useless, downright an nuisance, where I am better off getting rid of it altogether or pay. E.g. limited download speed, cap on daily data, elimination of international servers...

Review.Titre: Customer support of a paying customer
Review.Contenu: My personal experience of this service has been poor. A new app or update seemed to make it unworkable in my region, an area where you need a VPN. Did use the customer support and to be honest support was terrible. The support seemed to follow a script so stiffly that it was clear my discretion of the issue where simple being ignored.

I got the free version and tried to connect to Canadian netflix with it. Not only did netflix pick up on it and prevent me from watching anything, but I was also blocked out from every website other than outlook web app. It came up with "(website name) unexpectedly closed the connection." The issue was immediately resolved when I removed and uninstalled Hotspot Shield

When they send a receipt there is link for cancelling your subscription but it will never work. After I click that, as if hotspot shield has blocked me, I somehow cannot reach to their website to sign in or whatever. I used my cell phone to get over that obstacle, it gives me sign in errors even though I enter my password right. I hit forgot my password tried to reset it, I receive an email to reset it but again the link would never open neither it is on my phone nor my computer. My only option left is to let the bank to block these shameless disgusting scammers

Untrustworthy Company!I just discovered by chance that Hotspot Shield has been billing my credit card for months. I didnt even know that this company exists!  The company is refusing to refund me the sums charged, although they can not provide any proof of the legality of the debit or the existence of a subscription. I warn of any association with this company!

I got a message that i was running out of disk space, so i investigatedJust saw, that a log file in this app was over 170 GB.When i tried deleting it, it would just recreate itself constantly writing massive amounts of data to my SSD each second (possibly damaging it).I'm sure this is not intended, but never downloading again.

Hotspot shield is by far, BY FAR, the worst hotspot program out there. Every time my computer turns on this stupid little piece of software opens up and turns on. Want to play a game? Lag because of hotspotshield. Need to check the news? Can't, you have to disable hotspot shield. I didnt even download it, and now i cant delete it either. There are so many better programs out there for you to use. This is one of the only reviews i have ever written, and probably will be the last for a while. Thats how much this program pisses me off.

Review.Titre: I am disgusted with this company!
Review.Contenu: I am disgusted with these people.  The software worked for a week and then the auto update loaded 8.0.0 version and it failed to work.  I have contacted them 3 times and still nothing!  I was even in the 45 day window for a refund and they are avoiding dealing with me.  They literally stole my money and are proud of their business practice.  Shame on them.

Review.Titre: Only a 30 minute limit for free?
Review.Contenu: I installed on my Android phone and then I turned the hotspot shield VPN on and showed me that I only can get 30 minute usage, why they would not increase that to like 2 hours and watch an ad for 30 seconds and then get more hours, I AM NEVER INSTALLING THIS GARAGE EVER AGAIN, Stay away from hotspot shield, they old let you use 30 minutes per day

I checked these reviews before buying this premium service and everything looked good. Everything worked fine for 1 day. The next day I opened the app and it said 'Something went wrong, we are working to fix this' no matter how long this is left it never works. The only way to use the software is to delete and redownload every day, which is ridiculous. I even tried to talk to customer service who asked non-relevant questions, They don't know how to fix it the software is simply broken.

Review.Titre: Sorry to say that but one of the worst…
Review.Contenu: Sorry to say that but one of the worst support, they simply ignoring me.- My account manager email does not exist.- First level support contacted at the end of Jan and got a generic reply (27 Jan) "Moving forward your case will be handled by an escalation team and they will get this email sent to the right department. They will get back to you directly as soon as possible."- No response since then! Even though I emailed them several times politely asking about the status. Request number - 5327596

Review.Titre: Do not sign up for this hotspot Vpn
Review.Contenu: Do not sign up for this hotspot Vpn! There is no unsubscribe button or to remove your credit card payment. They saved in their system and there is no way you can unlink it! And they auto renew without u knowing and none email were received! Went to the live chat twice! To tell them I have unsubscribe. But they just keep charging u everytime on your renewal date! And give no solution on subscribing and unlink a payment method! Think twice before choosing this service! They do refund. But if u did not check your credit card. They will just charge it without u knowing! Beware!

Review.Titre: Stay away from the free trial
Review.Contenu: Decided to give it a try since it was free... Big mistake. Once it's on your PC, it ain't leaving. Basically a virus that gives you a really weak VPN connection. Wasn't impressed with it TBH and was really annoyed that I'm now stuck with this thing forever. Thanks.

Better to report them to the authorities.

Extremely bad experience, probably notethical business practice as well.  AVOID !

A purchase is required if you want to use this service, not that this information is on their website, so you will have to install their service in the good faith that it´s free, and the only disadvantage is the ads - WRONG!! You cannot use this unless you pay.

Review.Titre: overpriced & leaked my IPV6. but its decent.
Review.Contenu: Got an email from my internet provider saying I've been downloading.. how would they know when I use a VPN? Well! Hotspot Shield doesn't always cover your IPV6; sometimes it does and sometimes it doesn't.. I have to go into the Wi-Fi properties and disable the IPV6.. And its funny, when I cancelled my membership is when I got the email from my provider lol I mean $16.99USD for a Canadian comes up to like $23 a month.. Thats half my phone bill.. Ridonkiculous I would pay $9.99 - if its priced because of the features, well - not everyone wants the features. Consider making multiple products for your customers instead of forcing one with options they might not even need.

Review.Titre: I bought the Premium few days ago and…
Review.Contenu: I bought the Premium few days ago and have started using it, but my friend is a professional coder and it was a problem with pictures loading on busmanity.com charter bus & limo USA booking website. We've checked the console in developer mode of the browser and found the SSL error. As a result, it turned out that it substitutes root certificates and transfers all traffic in unencrypted form, which means that all my data and passwords have been compromised. I highly recommend this VPN service. This review is the result of an investigation by a professional millionaire programmer with 18 years of experience.

Average VPN, however, the trial is not a trial - it is meant to scam people into auto-renew subscriptions when the trial cannot be easily (or at all - waiting for support) ended. DO NOT USE THIS SOFTWARE as it intentionally misleads/scams people.

Review.Contenu: I had a lifetime account for years purchased through the actual company website, they have since merged with pango.co and now my lifetime account is gone. For me, using the service from Chumphon, Thailand, is a joke. The speeds for any and all VPN locations is too slow to stream anything. Sure, if you want to read a text website, it would work. But since when are text websites using geolocation to block viewership? Since never. The real service is video streaming, and hotspotshield is just too slow to provide this. I always know when Hotspotshield accidentally turns itself on, because none of my websites load. It's pathetic really. I paid for 1 year, and can't use this 'service'. I mainly wanted to use it to watch TV while abroad (abc.com etc)It also does work ok with torrents, where the slowdown is not as noticeable, though I barely use torrents myself.I have a great wired Internet, 50 Mbs download, 20 upload, and it is exactly that when I test my speed. Doing a speed test when hotspot shield is on is a joke (again), the speedtest reports way lower speeds than even shown on hotspotshield interface (which are dismal at best). Don't buy it, unless all you need is to browse the web with no video/audio, or for torrenting. Plus, if you get a yearly subscription you'll still be getting ads, namely their advertisements for a 'lifetime subscription'. Thanx, I'll pass.

Review.Titre: Worked for 2 months, then totally useless
Review.Contenu: After a couple of months, the app disappeared all of a sudden from my PC after I went on vacation for two weeks.  I have uninstalled and reinstalled different versions of it, depending on whoever is answering my requests for service/help, and nothing works.  The servers get stuck in one location, when it did work about 10 days for one day.  All of a sudden Pango is asking for my login credentials; it never did before.  Now I am totally locked out of my account and Pango Pango has three years subscription that I paid--for no VPN service for the remaining 2 years 9 months.DO NOT SUBSCRIBE TO PANGO HOTSPOT.   iT LOOKS GOOD ON THE SURFACE.  I think it contracts out to Third World countries for customer service, the reps have no idea what they are saying.I was lured into thinking it would be good by the aggressive customer chat.  It might work for a few weeks or even a couple of months but after that it falls apart and none of their updates does anything but cause havoc with your working life.I've only connected to it once in the past three weeks.After that I got the message that "it can't connect to the VPN adapter.  Uninstall app."The app is nowhere anymore on PC so I can't uninstall it (or re-install it with any of the updated versions).It has simply stopped working despite my tinkering it for hours, with "the help" of half a dozen of their staff.I slapped down $110 for this.  It took a dozen or so emails finally for them to refund this.  It was hardly worth the hours of frustration trying to tweek this thing, send & read emails back and forth, trying to make sense of all the different new instructions.I can't believe this thing happens.  No one would purchase VPN service is this were the norm.There has got to be a trustworthy VPN but this is NOT it.  Do your homework.
Be carefull!!!Problematic software.
NOT WORTH IT CYBER GHOST IS BETTER

Review.Titre: Free daily data is too less
The Hotspotshield users trust in the protection of foreigners' privacy by US authorities
Review.Contenu: We have tested a VPN vendor, which has a special relationship with US authorities and secret services: HotspotShield.There were of course many questions, why one offer a VPN service as anonymization, but which is quite openly supported by US secret service circles. This requires understanding the logic. Many citizens in the US continue to think that the authorities want to do good things for them, and undoubtedly this is true. Whether we as Europeans want to trust this after all the information we have since Edward Snowdens documents about this also a service, is another question!"The Hotspotshield users trust in the protection of foreigners' privacy by US authorities."This is why this review differs a little from our usual format. We have also received no technical answers to our written inquiries to Hotspotshield. Much of what we could discover has confirmed our assumptions. There are clear connections to US intelligence NSA and the FBI! And in the end, every user should be aware of the potential of "monitoring"Looking at the responsible managers of HotspotShield, the proximity and connections with the US authorities reveals:    Alec Ross    He was a technological advisor to Hillary Clinton when she was a member of the US government and at that time also supported the attempt and start of international surveillance on the Internet by the NSA directly with the US government.    Reed E. Hundt    He was chairman of the United States Federal Communications Commission under Bill Clinton as President of the US and thus presumably significantly involved in the expansion of the NSA surveillance measures at that time.    Dr. Peter Hoag    He was also a co-founder of a CIA subsidiary, Cardinal Technologies , which sought technological unification of data transmissions in the US networks. Cardinal Technologies was also a consultant to some US-friendly governments in Europe and is probably still working for US-based intelligence services.    Kevin Cook    He is still in the management of the Barracuda Network , which became known through their "backdoors" on the hard drives and firewall ingloriously.    Rick Roth    Is known as a national adviser to the US authorities for corporate networks in the USA and is regarded as a liaison between national interests and corporate interests in the USA.    Doug Maine    He worked for IBM as a financial manager. IBM itself is known for the cooperation with US authorities also became international espionage and was banished from China among other things.    Greg Coleman    He has worked in a number of US-based corporations in senior editorial offices such as AOL, Huffington Post, and some online media houses, all of which provide US government-friendly reporting, as well as public opinion, as well as circumvention of government encryption.    Reference : All persons are also listed as managers and managers of the operating company " AnchorFree.com - Team " of HotSpotShield.The list of allegedly "US government delegates" to Hotspotshield could be extended even further. It is rather unlikely to assume that all of these people have suddenly committed themselves to protecting the privacy and anonymity of international users. A public stand for "freedom and democracy" does not necessarily mean a respectful approach to the privacy of non-US citizens. What is meant by freedom, whether this is only for US citizens or for each user is to use the hotspotshield, remains unclear. Even if many of these people state this as the main argument for your commitment yourself!The "Goldman Sachs Group" finances the company!Anyone who installs HotspotShield may also become part of the "US strategy for international surveillance on the Internet".Hotspotshield can also be called"Trojans with voluntary self-installation of the users!"understand.What sounds ironic at first sight, however, has a serious background. Because the technical components of the service allow it to monitor the users much better than without the use of the case. With allegedly 400 million installations on PC`s worldwide, Hotspotshield can be a quite interesting factor in the strategy to monitor the entire world on the Internet!Technical conditions also allow targeted monitoring.In our test, we have installed the application on a specially prepared Windows PC. In addition to the usual VPN connection certificates, access certificates were also installed. In this case it would be technically possible to connect to the user's PC without warning or to send different data to decoded servers without being requested. The data transmission would be encrypted as well, and the user can hardly provide any proof of this.The communication of the company suggests protection of one's privacy, anonymity and security! It is important, however, that potential users are also aware of the dangers that may arise.Freedom and protection for Turkish oppositionists! But turns out to be a Trojan horse with US support! Possibly to consciously undermine freedom of expression!Particularly bad in our view, it is also, since Hotspotshield in the last years also massively and specifically in Turkey was advertised. This should obviously lead to government-critical activists to trust this service. As a Turkish journalist recently reported on Twitter, he was charged with government criticism and he had always used Hotspotshield.    "Turkish authorities detain VOA & BBC reporters, adding to 145 journalists already in jails in Turkey -world's largest prison for journalists Twitter "Meanwhile, however, the use of Hotspotshield within Turkey has been blocked.

Review.Titre: Fast Speeds, But Only If You're Lucky

I'd Say It Works About 40% Of The Time.Even Though I'm A Premium Subscriber Through Another Service (Dashlane), This Level Of Incompetency Is Wild.Sincerely,Boonu

Hey guys, I used the service for a few months but then found a better alternative.My last month of subscription expired and I have absolutely no way to cancel it, don't see any option in my account. Yes, because my subscription has ended I now can't cancel it and the service continues to bill my credit card (it now doesn't have enough funds, so the payment doesn't get through).Honestly, this is pretty ridiculous you have to pay and have an active sub in order to cancel your subscription, will never recommend this service.

I ask you to return at least part of the funds that were written off for an unused service, even if it was 13 euros that were written off several dozen hours ago, I would already be grateful for that. The service still does not work in my country, no matter how many times I have visited.  You can see from the inputs that I haven’t used it for several months. Nevertheless the email-support is always eager to help and successful in solving my problems.

I love this product.  I've used other apps like this in the past and they always slowed down my browser.  Hotspot shield is fast.  I've had some issues with my subscription, but customer service was on top of it both times.  My only complaint is that it stays active unless you turn it off, so if you don't and you shut your computer down restarting it leaves the app still on.  It isn't that bad, but I can forget that it is on.

Review.Titre: Great product but "chat-only" customer support makes dealing with nuanced issues tricky.
Review.Contenu: Update 1/5/2023:After submitting the review below on 12/29/2022 I was contacted by customer support at Hotspot and issued a refund for the double charged amount.  The staff was quick to respond, and more than happy to help.  The explanation given with regards to why the customer service rep initially only offered a partial refund was lack of training, but I think that more realistically the factors leading to such a discrepancy are the communication model and lack of agency for front line employees.  I had excellent service from the initial rep who tried to help me, but they were constrained by the policies of the company.  The next interaction with staff was from a management level, and it seemed like they had more agency to resolve issues that aren't spelled out in policy verbatim.  It is unfortunate that not being able to speak to someone on the phone initially forced me to leave a bad review before getting connected to someone that had the ability to fix the problem.  I do acknowledge the lack of diligence on my end toward noticing that I was being charged for a service I had already purchased.  However according to the staff:  it shouldn't be something that can happen, and they're looking into how to keep it from happening in the future.  Original reivew:The product is good, but it’s easy to be double charged.  The company lets you pay via several different auto-renew avenues (direct, via Apple subscriptions…etc) and does not prevent a customer from signing up multiple times for the same account.  There was  difficulty even confirming that I had been paying more than once for the same service.  In addition, they cite a “45-day” limit to dispute any charges.  Essentially I had initially paid for a yearly subscription, and on top of that purchase I erroneously was able to sign up for a monthly subscription for the same service.  Eventually I was able to get a credit onto my account for the double charges, but that was not initially offered…I was initially only offered 1 months refund for a double charge over the course of 12 months.  Once again, the product is good, but the communication and refund policies are not easy to navigate.

I am still running Windows 7 on one of my computers, and for various reason want to continue with 7.Recently Hotspot Shield refused to work and I got a message "IP collision detected". I contacted the help facility and got a number of steps to try.After several "dead ends" the problem was solved by deleting the driver "Hotspotshield TAP-Windows Adapter V9" and installing "hsstap-windows-9.24.4-I601"
It takes a while to receive a response but ultimately there can be some consensus made after a while. [PLEASE ADD PHONE SUPPORT TO OPTIMIZE REVIEWS]
